headline.main: Teenage Obesity Linked to Poor Mother-Child Bond

docs.abstract: Research shows that teenagers who had a poor relationship with their mothers when they were young are more likely to be obese - but what causes those mothers and toddlers to struggle?
docs.snippet: Research shows that teenagers who had a poor relationship with their mothers when they were young are more likely to be obese - but what causes those mothers and toddlers to struggle?

headline.main: Teenage Obesity Linked to Poor Mother-Child Bond

docs.abstract: Research shows that teenagers who had a poor relationship with their mothers when they were young are more likely to be obese - but what causes those mothers and toddlers to struggle?
docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers from Ohio State University analyzed data from a study following nearly 1,000 children from infancy through the ninth grade and found that children who were "insecurely attached" or otherwise showed signs of a poor maternal relationship before age 3 were more likely to be obese at 15.
docs.snippet: Research shows that teenagers who had a poor relationship with their mothers when they were young are more likely to be obese - but what causes those mothers and toddlers to struggle?
